channel.title: Authors on Kevin Rue-Albrecht
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Kevin Rue-Albrecht

item.description: Kevin Rue-Albrecht is a postdoctoral researcher of computational biology in the Sansom Lab at the University of Oxford. His research interests include computational biology, software development and single-cell genomics. His research explores the immune response to infection, disease, and self antigens.

Kevin Rue-Albrecht is a postdoctoral researcher of computational biology in the Sansom Lab at the University of Oxford.
